title: I know a lot of people don't like her....
body:
but can we show LeBlanc's Auto attack a little love. Just make the animation a bit better, not add any stats or anything
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/c5/c5d5b517c9a526eb953dd4fd121667040b3512959c8de616ec8f2f01190d3540.jpg

replies.body: What's so funny? Her AA animation is really bad, that's all I meant, I didn't mean to add any stats or anything. I should probably put that in the OP

She was released with a really good attack animation actually, for a mage anyway.

It's not been changed since release.
As long as you take away her blink in and out of a position, sure, improve her auto attack. Make it so she moves at a reasonable speed and can be hit while moving. >:-)
I actually think it's pretty cool as it is.
